Reviews.Title: As tough as they get
Reviews.Author: Marc S.
Reviews.Content: I didn't buy mine through Amazon but have had it for almost 5 years now.  This phone has gone through rain, snow, hot and cold and never failed me.  I'm even on the orignal battery and get about a week and a half of use on each charge.  If there is a weak spot on this phone it is the rubber but do not let that mislead you into thinking without it it is any less tough.  I have dropped the phone from a ladder, had it bounce across the sidewalk and it still keeps on going.  Not having a camera was a plus for me because some areas I go to they are not allowed and so I don't have to drop off the phone.  I absolutely recommend this phone for anyone who is working in harsh environments or even better are like me who ride motorcycles in all weather and just don't want their phone to fail just because it rained and they got soaked.  Once you have the mapping of the features set up to your liking, this phone is a fire and forget tool you will wonder how you got along without it before.  If you're looking for something to spend all day surfing the internet, this is not your phone but if you are looking for a PHONE and need to do some texting, you will find nothing sturdier or reliable.  In case you can't tell I love this phone.

Reviews.Title: 18th century
Reviews.Author: Silverlaker
Reviews.Content: The keypad locks during all calls. Not an option. So you can check voicemail but you can't delete, skip or save messages. You can't call the bank, pay bills, call into work because you can't maneuver a menu. End of story. I can't tell you any positive or other negative things about it because I sent it right back. Oh, it's impossible to not hit the AT&T; navigator button. It is right in the middle.it's a terrible map and it's ten dollar per month feature, designed to make you purchase it by mistake.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement for the Tundra
Reviews.Author: Johnny Mac
Reviews.Content: My Auto Parts store uses push-to-talk and GPS.  We had all Motorolla Tundra phones.  Even used replacements were expensive.  The Samsung SGH-A657 has all the functions and seems just as sturdy.  The boss is happy.

Reviews.Title: not so rugged
Reviews.Author: Marco Vargas "MarcoVargas"
Reviews.Content: it lasted for about 3 months and all the rubber started to fall off... supposed to be a rugged phone, NOT!!

Reviews.Title: Phone for serious environments, outstanding customer service
Reviews.Author: Chris and Sherry
Reviews.Content: The phone is great for seriously harsh environments.  Desert dust and sand don't affect it at all, reception is good.  What really sets this phone apart, however, is the excellent customer service I received from the reseller, SoonerSoft Electronics.

Reviews.Title: EVERYTHING I WANTED BUT;
Reviews.Author: PADWGN
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE WAS GREAT AND THE DEALER WAS AWSOME, BUT IT DIDN'T HAVE A CAMERA.  NONE OF THE PHONES I WAS RESEARCHING HAD ALOT OF DISCRIPTION.  I'M WONDERING IF IT WAS BECAUSE OF WHAT THE SITE ALLOWS.  ANY WAY ASK PLENTY OF QUESTIONS ABOUT PHONE AND MAKE SURE IT HAS ALL YOU WANT.  THIS DEALER WAS VERY UNDERSTANDING AND HAD NO TROUBLE SENDING BACK.
